name: Dodge Show
description: Use the mouse or keyboard to evade the bombardment of multiple different types of skills in the game area, strive to survive and get your highest score. Your score depends only on your reactions and skills. Please enjoy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 (K8) 2.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics with OpenGL 2.1 Storage: 100 MB available space
